title: Add Product Dialog -- manual creation
description: Implement AddProductDialog with ShadCN Dialog and Tabs (Manual/Import tabs). Implement ManualProductForm with TanStack Form + Zod validation (productFormSchema from product-schema.ts), image upload via 3-step Convex flow (generateUploadUrl, POST file, pass storageId to createProduct), client-side file validation (image/* types, max 5MB). The Import tab shows a placeholder message for now. Wire the 'Add Product' button on the products page to open this dialog. Success/error feedback via Sonner toast.success() and toast.error(). Covers FR-15, FR-16, FR-23, NFR-3, NFR-4.
